phrases: Once upon a time, there was a young woman.
The young woman was to marry a groom chosen by her parents, and not her sweetheart, whom she loved.
She knew that her groom loved her very much, but did her sweetheart care for her even more than that?
The young woman was not certain.
In the end, after wavering between the two of them, the young woman even became unsure which one of them she really loved.
In searching for a way to return Mytho to the story, I just took to hand whatever books struck me.
So why do I choose only books whose endings are missing?
What meaning is there to these torn up books?
Jeez, Ahiru, cannot you even go a day without getting yourself put on cleaning duty?
Ahiru, you must not look right now!
What did you do that for, all of a...
There is something you must not look at RIGHT THERE, look!
That totally ruins his bad-boy appeal!
That is right, we need him to become a full-fledged juvenile delinquent!
Who is this woman who can take the bite out of Fakir-sama?!
An older-woman lover has made her appearance, huh!
We still do not know that she is his lover!
That is right, you should have unreasonable hopes!
Are you a friend of Fakir's?
She is calling her a friend right off the bat!
Talk about the unfazed confidence of the adult woman!
I do not know if you would call me a friend or a... a... well...
Oh, it is like I can see Ahiru's crying face before me!
I cannot sit here any longer.
We were all just on our way to the ice cream shop.
Ahiru-san, we are going to Fakir's house now.
I am impressed you found out where I was.
You cannot hide anything from me, Fakir.
In our house there is still...
It is been a long time, has not it Karon?
Who do you go well together with zura?
It is a new lovey-dovey zura!
I do not think I have seen you since Mytho and I entered Gold Crown Academy.
It is all right, I am like an older sister to Fakir.
I mean, no, I was not really...
Ever since my parents died and I was taken in by Karon, she is been like a surrogate mother to me.
Is older sister different from lovey-dovey zura?
Then is Raetsel lovey-dovey with Kar...
You are going to treat me like a child, as always?
I am at an age where it would not be odd if I married somebody, you know.
To me, you have not changed one bit.
You are just like when you were romping around with Fakir and Mytho.
That reminds me, where is Mytho?
Oh, yeah, he is at school.
He is completely wrapped up in his dancing.
But you always used to be with him, saying, I will protect Mytho!
You are staying the night, right?
I plan to stay at the water mill.
I will walk you there, then.
Thank you, but I think I would like to take a little walk with Ahiru-san.
I am a tiny bit jealous.
Fakir with a girl as cute as you...
Oh, no, I am not cute at all!
And I am always fighting with Fakir, actually sometimes I just cannot STAND him...
I wonder if it is thanks to you that Fakir has changed.
The stories that boy wrote sometimes came true.
He loved to write stories from the time when he was very small.
They were just silly little stories, but sometimes parts of them came true.
But after he came to Karon's house, he completely stopped writing.
Oh, I have said a little too much.
I wonder if Fakir will scold me?
If he can do that... maybe...
I just remembered something I have to do!
Um, it was fun talking to you!
No, the one who is changed the most...
Help me, Fakir, my heart is...
In the story, you are no longer needed.
Whether I am here or not.
But all I have... is a sword.
I will protect Mytho with this sword.
Fakir, I heard from Raetsel-san that the stories you write come true!
If you do have that power, then if you write a story where Mytho is saved...
I said, I heard the stories you wrote when you were little came true...
What do you mean, shut up?
Why are you talking to me that way?
If I could help Mytho by myself, I would not ask you to do this!
But right now, I cannot do anything, so...
I told you to be quiet!
I will protect Mytho as a knight.
I will not take orders from you!
If you can help Mytho, then why will not you?!
We were waiting for you so we would be ready whenever you came home crying!
I do not care about that Fakir anymore!
Get angry and cry as much as you want!
We will give you lots of comfort!
And I thought we would be able to help Mytho...
Lately it is like Mytho-sama is a totally different person.
He makes the hairs on the back of my neck stand up!
Mytho... I am jealous of you.
If I could live without changing, like you...
I am different than I was before.
I have gotten my heart back.
Now I can even accept your love for me.
Maybe I will call off the wedding.
Which means the girl is Rue-san?
The two of them are getting married?!
Students of mine are getting married before me!
There is no happier thing for a teacher than this!
You do not look very happy.
Could it be you are wavering?
What I said before was a joke!
Hans will love me from the bottom of his heart.
With him, I am sure I can be happy.
You cannot lie to your own feelings.
You have got a pure and beautiful heart, have not you?
Sacrifice your life and love me!
If I do as Father says, someday he will be my prince alone.
The fight between the prince and the raven is being fought with fiercer and fiercer desperation.
In a place where no one can see it, that is.
She is definitely toying with him!
That is right, a Fakir played thoroughly by an adult woman and then tossed away like a tattered dishrag!
I would love for him to keep on like this and become more and more of a delinquent!
Fakir said he would protect Mytho, so why?
I will protect Mytho as a knight.
I will not take orders from you!
And it was starting to look like we would be able to work together too...
I do not want things to stay like this!
Hey, wait, where are you going, Ahiru?
Time for the second round, right?
Oh, Ahiru, you do so love battles!
I see, so Fakir said that...
I want to help someone, and he is someone important to Fakir too...
So I thought if Fakir wrote a story, maybe we could help him, but...
This is because I said something I should not have.
Ahiru-san, will you pretend you never heard what I said before?
But if that person is saved, Fakir will be happy too...
But in exchange, Fakir will be hurt.
A long time ago, a lot of crows once showed up in Gold Crown Town.
The crows attacked the townspeople indiscriminately.
Fakir was a child, but he must have wanted to do something to help.
He wrote a story where he became a hero and defeated the crows.
And then just like Fakir had written, the crows came and attacked him.
But the ending was different than his story.
Afterwards, it was as if he would sealed those memories away.
And he stopped writing stories too.
I did not know that Fakir had something like that happen to him...
He must still be unable to recover from it...
I came to get you, Raetsel...
What should I say to Fakir?
Do you want to say something to Fakir zura?
There is a lot of crows zura!
Could Mytho be doing to Raetsel-san...
Raetsel, I will give you a love with no wavering.
You will love only me, will not you?
Come, Raetsel, and give your beautiful heart to me!
If you do have that power, then if you write a story where Mytho is saved...
The power to make stories come true?
A power like that, in me?
Could it be that Mytho is lovey-dovey with Raetsel-san zura?!
That is a lovely wedding dress.
You have someone you are engaged to, right?
Karon knows how I feel, but he did not say anything.
He tells me of his love.
He looks at only me, and holds me.
But no matter what I do, I see Karon's face in my mind!
You are suffering because you are wavering between two loves.
If you love me, your wavering will disappear.
You must not go over there.
That is something you feel because you truly love people.
When I think that, being with him is so hard and so painful.
I do not want to waver anymore!
You should just forget everything else, and love only me!
Both of those are your true heart, Raetsel-san.
But is what you are trying to get right now your true feelings?
True and false have nothing to do with it!
People just love others because they want to be loved!
So she wavers because she wonders which one will love her!
That pain is how you really feel!
You want to be happy with the one you love most, do not you?
I weighed their loves against each other for the sake of my own happiness!
To escape from the pain of my wavering, I set out to get Fakir to write a story about me!
Even though I knew it would hurt him!
Everyone wants to be loved by the people they love.
It is not bad to feel that way.
I am sure it is painful to waver between two loves.
But even if you run away from that, you will not be able to escape the pain.
I will not allow you to hurt Raetsel!
The two of you fighting is...
Do not just prattle what is convenient for you!
A knight who could not even die should not talk so big!
How long do you mean to go on shaming yourself wielding your play sword?!
You know you cannot lay a finger on me!
This sword is not for slaying you with!
Do not hurt Fakir, you raven!
I forgot everything but my desire to escape my pain...
And I did something to hurt you...
It is not your fault, Raetsel.
Raetsel-san was suffering so much, but she told me...
She told me to give you space.
Raetsel-san did not want to hurt you.
Did not want to hurt you...
Do not hurt Fakir, you raven!
If I could help Mytho by myself, I would not ask you to do this!
But right now, I cannot do anything, so...
Oh, did you write a story for me?
Karon, I am going to marry Hans.
You see, I think I wanted to say a proper goodbye to Karon.
Your story did not come true, huh?
I think I will try writing one.
That power is truly dangerous, you know.
You could not even completely become a knight.
Will you really be able to master it?
They took out the endings to stop the stories from becoming real?
It seems he is gained the knowledge, but that is all.
You are a direct descendant of Drosselmeyer's, and this is your level?
You hesitated to take my hand!
Mytho was always kind to Rue-chan, but...
To those who accept everything, happiness.
To those who resist everything, glory.
All you children who love stories, come gather around.
The voice calling, come now, wake up
The brilliant light and the dew on trees are born
By the secret water's edge that no one knows of
Dance the pas de deux of life
It is a gentle, yet fierce current
How far does the labyrinth stretch?
I loved like I was dreaming
I thought how wonderful it was to be alive
I want to be there for you
Passing by even the wind and the rain clouds
